segments.text: Have you ever run into a person who tries bleed you white ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am always on the look out for such girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear that some guys splash all their money about on them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mark is one of them . He has trouble with a girl who turned out to be a dead beat .
